publication.abstract: The Wavefront OBJ format is a common file format for storing mesh data. It is convenient to be able to write VTK data structures out into this format, as the data can then be used in software that can read OBJ files.

comments.content:
Some comments:
It doesn\'t compile with VTK 5.10: vtkStdString is missing -> change into std::string
Writer fails to write correctly vtkPolyData with triangle strips, half of the triangles are missing (or half of the face normals are inverted)
License file is missing in the source
Headers (copyright) are missing in each file
Some comments in API would be welcome: e.g. \"Write as ascii\", \"Write normals, colors...\"

publication.title: A Wavefront OBJ Writer for VTK
